tool_description: Find the latest video on any car.  Daily updates,  ability to search video by manufacturer or by model.
name: Car Videos
title: Car Videos

api_list.name: Video
api_list.description: Using this endpoint you can find tons of videos and filter them by modelId and manufacturerId

api_list.name: Manufacturers & Models
api_list.description: List of all cars manufacturers with all models they have.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://car-videos.p.rapidapi.com/manufacturers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "car-videos.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://car-videos.p.rapidapi.com/manufacturers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "car-videos.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
